response.original_title: RKL: Still Flailing After All These Beers!
response.overview: Enjoy the out-of-control craziness of West Coast punk rock band Rich Kidz on LSD, which presents a bunch of their songs including "Beautiful Feeling," "Scab on My Brain," "Excerpt from Trash TV," "In Your Mind," "Feelings of Hate" and many more. Featuring over a decade of live performances, music videos, backstage footage and candid home movies, this program will surely entertain the band's rowdy and rebellious fans.
response.title: RKL: Still Flailing After All These Beers!
